The goal of 2024_scgis_webr is to ...

WebR allows users to run R in the browser without a server and without having to install anything. This is really useful when sharing code with others. 

## What is WebR and web assembly? 

WebR is a project that allows you to run R in the browser. It uses web assembly to compile R code to a format that can be run in the browser.
